thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses Canada Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses Canada | smartbuyglasses.ca
thread.title: Dana C.
thread.title_full: SmartBuyGlasses Canada reviewed by Dana C.

author: Dana C.
title: Dana C.
text: Wonderful experience with SmartBuyGlasses. It's my second order with them. Fast shipping service, professional handling and packaging of the prodcut. And last but not least, I really love my new Prada glasses. I'll do business with them again for sure. Their variation of glass frames is amazing, and pricing is good on discount especially.
